techmeme.title: ChatGPT refuses to say some names, possibly due to digital privacy requests or a post-prompt handling fault; OpenAI may have fixed the viral "David Mayer" issue (Devin Coldewey/TechCrunch)
AWS details updates to its data centers, including liquid cooling for AI servers, more simplified electrical and mechanical designs for server racks, and more (Frederic Lardinois/TechCrunch)
RTFKT, the digital wearables NFT startup Nike acquired in 2021, is shutting down by the end of January 2025; DefiLlama: RTFKT brought in ~$50M in total earnings (Daniel Kuhn/The Block)
Twitch creator Kai Cenat completed a "subathon", streaming 24 hours a day for 30 days, breaking Twitch subscriber records with ~727,700 subscribers in November (Zach Vallese/CNBC)
How generative AI may bridge current computing paradigms to future innovations, especially in wearables, which will benefit from context-aware user interfaces (Ben Thompson/Stratechery)
